questions.text: The drug of choice for the treatment of group C or G streptococcal infections is:
questions.explanation:

Penicillin Penicillin is an antibiotic that belongs to a larger family of drugs known as beta-lactam antibiotics. Penicillins work by binding to molecules on the walls of bacteria called peptidoglycan.

Highyeild:

Penicillin is the drug of choice for the treatment of group C or G streptococcal infections Multi-drug treatment of pulmonary tuberculosis. Treat all stages of syphilis. For respiratory trail infection mainly atypical organisms.

questions.text: Among the following options, Spiramycin belongs to which class?
questions.explanation:
Solution:

Macrolide Macrolides are a class of natural products that consist of a large macrocyclic lactone ring to which one or more deoxy sugars, usually cladinose and desosamine, may be attached. The lactone rings are usually 14-, 15-, or 16-membered. Macrolides belong to the polyketide class of natural products.

Highyeild:

Spiramycin Is a macrolide Used in toxoplasmosis of pregnancy Reduces risk of transplacental transmission of toxoplasma gondii infection.

Random:

Explanation for incorrect options:- Option: A. Aminoglycoside is a medicinal and bacteriologic category of traditional Gram-negative antibacterial medications that inhibit protein synthesis and contain as a portion of the molecule an amino-modified glycoside (sugar) Option: C. Lincosamides consist of a pyrrolidine ring linked to a pyranose moiety (methylthio-lincosamide) via an amide bond. Hydrolysis of lincosamides, specifically lincomycin, splits the molecule into its building blocks of the sugar and proline moieties Option: D . Streptogramin , Streptogramin A is a group of antibiotics within the larger family of antibiotics known as streptogramins. They are synthesized by the bacteria Streptomyces virginiae. The streptogramin family of antibiotics consists of two distinct groups: group A antibiotics contain a 23-membered unsaturated ring with lactone and peptide bonds while group B antibiotics are depsipeptides
